text: Ara ihudira kakhano tomara upare santasta habe na, khristanara'o naya, yataksana na tumi tadera dharmamata anusarana kara. Tadera balo -- â€œniscaya'i allahâ€Œra ya hedayata ta'i-i hedayata. Ara tumi yadi tadera icchara anusarana kara tomara kache jnanera ya eseche tara pare, tahale allahara kacha theke tumi pabe na kono bandhu-bandhaba, na kono sahayyakari.
